import { users, generateId } from './db';

const resolvers = {
  Query: {
    // ãƒ»ãƒ»ãƒ»
  },
  Mutation: {
    createUser: (parent, { name, email, age }, context, info) => {
      const newUser = { id: generateId(), name, email, age};
      users.push(newUser);
      return newUser;
    },
    updateUser: (parent, { id, name, email, age }, context, info) => {
      const updatedUser = users.find(user => user.id == id);
      updatedUser.name = name;
      updatedUser.email = email;
      updatedUser.age = age;
      return updatedUser;
    },
    deleteUser: (parent, { id }, context, info) => {
      const userIndex = users.findIndex(user => user.id == id);
      if (userIndex === -1) throw new Error('User not found');
      const [deletedUser] = users.splice(userIndex, 1);
      return deletedUser;
    }
  },
  // ãƒ»ãƒ»ãƒ»
};

ãƒªã‚¾ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ã§Subscriptionã‚’å®šç¾©ã—ã€Mutationã‚‚ä¿®æ­£ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ Mutationã‚‚ä¿®æ­£ã™ã‚‹ã®ã¯ã€ç™»éŒ²ãƒ»æ›´æ–°ãƒ»å‰Šé™¤å®Œäº†å¾Œã«Subscriptionã‚’ç™ºè¡Œã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã§ã™ã€‚

src/resolvers.jsã®ä¸€éƒ¨
// Subscriptionã®ã‚„ã‚Šã¨ã‚Šã«ã¯`apollo-server`ã®PubSubã‚’ä½¿ã‚‹
// `graphpack`ã®å ´åˆã€`apollo-server`ã¯å…¥ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹
import { PubSub } from 'apollo-server';
import { users, generateId } from './db';
const pubsub = new PubSub();

const EVENT = {
    USER_CRAETED: 'userCreated',
    USER_UPDATED: 'userUpdated',
    USER_DELETED: 'userDeleted',
};

const resolvers = {    
  // ãƒ»ãƒ»ãƒ»
  Mutation: {
    createUser: (parent, { name, email, age }, context, info) => {
      const newUser = { id: generateId(), name, email, age};
      users.push(newUser);
            
      pubsub.publish(EVENT.USER_CRAETED, {[EVENT.USER_CRAETED]: newUser});
      return newUser;
    },
    updateUser: (parent, { id, name, email, age }, context, info) => {
      const updatedUser = users.find(user => user.id == id);
      updatedUser.name = name;
      updatedUser.email = email;
      updatedUser.age = age;

      pubsub.publish(EVENT.USER_UPDATED, {[EVENT.USER_UPDATED]: updatedUser});
      return updatedUser;
    },
    deleteUser: (parent, { id }, context, info) => {
      const userIndex = users.findIndex(user => user.id == id);
      
      if (userIndex === -1) throw new Error('User not found');
      const [deletedUser] = users.splice(userIndex, 1);
      
      pubsub.publish(EVENT.USER_DELETED, {[EVENT.USER_DELETED]: deletedUser});
      return deletedUser;
    }
  },
  Subscription: {
    [EVENT.USER_CRAETED]: {
      subscribe: () => pubsub.asyncIterator([EVENT.USER_CRAETED])
    },
    [EVENT.USER_UPDATED]: {
      subscribe: () => pubsub.asyncIterator([EVENT.USER_UPDATED])
    },
    [EVENT.USER_DELETED]: {
      subscribe: () => pubsub.asyncIterator([EVENT.USER_DELETED])
    },
  },
  // ãƒ»ãƒ»ãƒ»
};

<script>

import createUserGql from '~/apollo/mutations/createUser.gql'

      isShowEditArea: false,

      // -1ã®å ´åˆã¯ç™»éŒ²

      editedIndex: -1,

      defaultEditedItem: {

  computed: {

    async createItem({

      const { error } = await this.$apollo.mutate({

        refetchQueries: [{

    async updateItem({

    async deleteItem(item) {

    // ç·¨é›†ã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢ã®å¤‰æ•°ã«å€¤ã‚’ä»£å…¥ã—ã¦ã€ç·¨é›†ã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    // ç·¨é›†ã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢ã®ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã®åˆæœŸåŒ–ã‚‚ã‚ã‚ã›ã¦å®Ÿæ–½ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    save() {

import userCreatedGql from '~/apollo/subscriptions/userCreated.gql'

  /* (ä¸­ç•¥) */

  apollo: {
    users: {
      query: getUsersGql,

      // Subscriptionã¯Smart Queryã®subscribeToMoreã§æŒ‡å®šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
      subscribeToMore: [
        // ç™»éŒ²æ™‚ã®å‡¦ç†ã§ã™
        {
          document: userCreatedGql,
          // Subscriptionç™ºç”Ÿæ™‚ã®å‡¦ç†ã‚’updateQueryã«å®šç¾©ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
          // ç¬¬ä¸€å¼•æ•°ã¯å‰å›ã®users

          updateQuery: (prev, { subscriptionData }) => {

            // ã“ã“ã§è¿”ã—ãŸå€¤ãŒusersã«ä»£å…¥ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚
            return prev.users.push(newUser)

        // æ›´æ–°æ™‚ã®å‡¦ç†ã§ã™ã€‚
        // ç™»éŒ²æ™‚ã¨ã»ã¼åŒæ§˜ã®å‡¦ç†ãªã®ã§èª¬æ˜ã¯å‰²æ„›ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
        {

          updateQuery: (prev, { subscriptionData }) => {
            if (!subscriptionData.data) {

            }

            const updatedUser = subscriptionData.data.userUpdated
            const targetUser = prev.users.find(user => user.id + '' === updatedUser.id + '')
            targetUser.name = updatedUser.name

            targetUser.age = updatedUser.age

        // å‰Šé™¤æ™‚ã®å‡¦ç†ã§ã™ã€‚

      })

        // ä»Šå›ã¯refetchQueriesã¯å®šç¾©ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

const striptags = require('striptags');
const axios = require('axios');
const cheerio = require('cheerio');
const crypto = require("crypto");
const Parser = require('rss-parser');
const parser = new Parser({
  headers: {'User-Agent': 'something different'},
});

const INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG = 'blog';
const INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG_POST = 'blogPost';


// RSSã®ã‚ˆã†ãªå¤–éƒ¨ãƒªã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’
// Gatsbyã§GraphQLã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã¨ã—ã¦æ‰±ã†ãŸã‚ã«ã¯
// sorceNodeã§å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹
exports.sourceNodes = async ({ actions, createNodeId, store, cache }) => {
  const feeds = [];
  
  // è¨­å®šãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‹ãªã«ã‹ã—ã‚‰ã®æ–¹æ³•ã§RSSã®URLã‚’èª­ã¿è¾¼ã‚€
  const blogUrls = ['rss-url-1', 'rss-url-2', ];

  for(const blogUrl of blogUrls) {
  
    // rss-parserã§RSSæƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹
    const feed = await parser.parseURL(blogUrl).then(feed => {

      return {
        ...feed,
        items: feed.items.map(item => ({
          title: item.title,
          excerpt: excerpt(item.content, 120),
          content: item.content,
          pubDate: new Date(item.pubDate).toISOString(),
          link : item.link,
        }))
      }
    });

    feeds.push(feed);
  }


  // ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°ã”ã¨ã«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ç”Ÿæˆ
  feeds
    .map(feed => ({
      title: feed.title,
      description: feed.description,
      link: feed.link,
      lastBuildDate: feed.lastBuildDate,
    }))
    .forEach(b => {
      const contentDigest = crypto.createHash(`md5`)
        .update(JSON.stringify(b))
        .digest('hex');
      
      actions.createNode({
        ...b,
        id: createNodeId(`${INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG}${b.link}`),
        children: [],
        parent: `__SOURCE__`,
        internal: {
          type: INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG,
          contentDigest,
        },
      });
    });

  // RSSã«åŠ ãˆã¦ã€OGPã‚’å–å¾—
  const rssPosts = feeds.map(feed => feed.items).reduce((a,b) => [...a, ...b]);
  const rssPostsWithImageUrl = [];
  // Promise.allã§ã‚„ã‚‹ã¨503ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã§foræ–‡ã‚’ä½¿ã†
  for (const p of rssPosts) {
    const pWithImageUrl = await axios.get(p.link, {
      headers: {'User-Agent': 'something different'},
    }).then(res => {

      // å–å¾—ã—ãŸHTMLã‹ã‚‰OGPã‚’å–å¾—
      const $ = cheerio.load(res.data)
      let imageUrl;
      $('head meta').each((i, el) => {
        const property = $(el).attr('property')
        const content = $(el).attr('content')
        if (property === 'og:image') {
          imageUrl = content
        }
      });

      // è¨˜äº‹æƒ…å ±ã«OGPã®URLã‚’è¿½åŠ 
      return {
        ...p,
        imageUrl,
      };
    });

    rssPostsWithImageUrl.push(pWithImageUrl);
  }


  // OGPç”»åƒã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
  // é‡è¤‡ã‚’è€ƒæ…®ã—ã¦ãƒ¦ãƒ‹ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã«ã—ã¦ã‹ã‚‰å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹
  const imageUrls = _uniq(rssPostsWithImageUrl.filter(p => p.imageUrl).map(p => p.imageUrl));

  await Promise.all(imageUrls.map(async imageUrl => {
    const fileNode = await createRemoteFileNode({
      url: imageUrl,
      cache,
      store,
      createNode: actions.createNode,
      createNodeId: createNodeId,
    });

    await actions.createNodeField({
      node: fileNode,
      name: 'ThumbnailImage',
      value: 'true',
    });
    await actions.createNodeField({
      node: fileNode,
      name: 'link',
      value: imageUrl,
    });

    return fileNode;
  }));


  // ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°è¨˜äº‹ã”ã¨ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ç”Ÿæˆ
  rssPostsWithImageUrl.forEach(p => {
    const contentDigest = crypto.createHash(`md5`)
      .update(JSON.stringify(p))
      .digest('hex');
    
    const excerpt = 
    actions.createNode({
      ...p,
      id: createNodeId(`${INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG_POST}${p.link}`),
      children: [],
      parent: `__SOURCE__`,
      internal: {
        type: INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG_POST,
        contentDigest,
      },
    });
  });
};


// è¨˜äº‹è¦ç´„ã¯è¨˜äº‹æœ¬æ–‡ã‹ã‚‰æŠ½å‡º
function excerpt(html, maxLength) {
  const rowText = striptags(html, '<pre>')
    .replace(/<pre[\s\S]+?>[\s\S]+?<\/pre>/g, '')
    .replace(/\n/g, '')
    .replace(/ /g, '')
    .trim();
  return rowText.length >= maxLength
    ? rowText.substring(0, maxLength) + '...'
    : rowText;
}

import React from "react"
import { Field, getIn } from 'formik';

// Formikã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸è¡¨ç¤ºç”¨ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
export default ({ name }) => (
  <Field
    name={name}
    render={({ form }) => {
      const error = getIn(form.errors, name);
      const touch = getIn(form.touched, name);
      cosnt isShowError = touch && error;

      return isShowError
        ? <div>{error}</div>
        : null;
    }}
  />
);

import React from 'react';
import { navigate } from "gatsby"
import { Formik, Field } from 'formik';
import ErrorMessage from './ErrorMessage';
import axios from "axios";

// ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã®å€¤ã‚’åˆæœŸåŒ–
/* (ç•¥) */

// å…¥åŠ›ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
/* (ç•¥) */

// ã‚µãƒ–ãƒŸãƒƒãƒˆå‡¦ç†
const handleSubmit = (values, actions) => {

  // FormDataä½œæˆ
  const  params = new FormData();

  params.append('form-name', values['form-name']);  // for Netlify Forms
  params.append('bot-field', values['bot-field']);  // for Netlify Forms
  params.append('sampleText', values['sampleText']);
  params.append('sampleFile', values['sampleFile']);

  // Formikã®é€ä¿¡ä¸­ãƒ•ãƒ©ã‚°ã‚’ã‚ªãƒ³ã«ã™ã‚‹
  actions.setSubmitting(true);
  // axiosã§éåŒæœŸã«ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚’é€ä¿¡
  axios({
    method: "POST",
    headers: { "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" },
    data: params,
    url: "/"
  }).then(res => {
    // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ é€ä¿¡å®Œäº†å¾Œ
    // ä»–ç”»é¢ã«é·ç§»ï¼ˆåŒæœŸé·ç§»ã§ã¯ãªãSPAã¨ã—ã¦ã®é·ç§»ï¼‰
    navigate('/application-complete');
    // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ å†…å®¹åˆæœŸåŒ–
    actions.resetForm();

    // æœ€å¾Œã«Formikã®é€ä¿¡ä¸­ãƒ•ãƒ©ã‚°ã‚’ã‚ªãƒ•ã«ã™ã‚‹
    actions.setSubmitting(false);
  }).catch(err => {
    // ãªã«ã‹ã—ã‚‰ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°
    actions.setSubmitting(false);

    /* (ä¸­ç•¥) */
  });
}


// Formæç”»å‡¦ç†

    method="POST"
    novalidate="true" {/* Formikã§å…¥åŠ›ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ã®å…¥åŠ›ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã¯ã‚ªãƒ• */}
    data-netlify="true"  {/* Netlifyã§Formã‚’èªè­˜ã•ã›ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®å±æ€§ */}
    netlify-honeypot="bot-field" {/* Netlifyã§Formã‚’èªè­˜ã•ã›ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®å±æ€§ */}
    onSubmit={handleSubmit}
  >
    {/* (ä¸­ç•¥) */}

const { createRemoteFileNode } = require(`gatsby-source-filesystem`);

// sourceNodesã«ã¦å¤–éƒ¨ç”»åƒã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹
exports.sourceNodes = async ({ actions, createNodeId, cache, store }) => {
  /* (ä¸­ç•¥) */

  // ã“ã“ã§ã¯å¤–éƒ¨ç”»åƒã®URLã®é…åˆ—ã‚’å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã‚’ç¤ºã™
  await Promise.all(sampleImageUrls.map(async sampleImageUrl => {

    // createRemoteFileNodeã§å¤–éƒ¨ã®ç”»åƒã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹
    const fileNode = await createRemoteFileNode({
      url: sampleImageUrl,

    });

    // ä»–ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¨åŒºåˆ¥ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®è­˜åˆ¥å­ã‚’ä»˜ä¸
    await actions.createNodeField({

    await actions.createNodeField({
      node: fileNode,

    });

    return fileNode;
  }));

  /* (ä¸­ç•¥) */
}

import React from 'react';

// OGPç”»åƒã®URLã‚’å¼•æ•°ã«å–ã‚‹
export default ({ url }) => (
  <StaticQuery
    query={graphql`
      query {
        allFile(
          # Gatsby Buildã§ä»˜ä¸ã—ãŸè­˜åˆ¥å­ã‚’ã‚‚ã¨ã«
          # å…¨ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‹ã‚‰OPGç”»åƒã®ã¿æŠ½å‡º
          filter: {fields: {SampleImage: {eq: "true"}}}

              }
              id
              fields {
                # ä¸€å¿œãƒ¡ã‚¿æƒ…å ±ã‚‚å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹
                SampleImage

    render={data => {
      // OGPç”»åƒãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã®ä¸­ã‹ã‚‰ã€ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆå¼•æ•°ã§æŒ‡å®šã—ãŸURLã®ç”»åƒã‚’æŠ½å‡ºã™ã‚‹
      const targetEdge = data.allFile.edges.find(edge => edge.node.fields.link === url);

      // ç”»åƒãŒå–å¾—ã§ããŸå ´åˆã®ã¿gatsby-imageã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’è¿”ã™
      return (

          : null
      );
    }}
  />
);

const axios = require('axios');
const cheerio = require('cheerio');
const { createRemoteFileNode } = require(`gatsby-source-filesystem`);

// sourceNodesã«ã¦å¤–éƒ¨ç”»åƒã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹
exports.sourceNodes = async ({ actions, createNodeId, cache, store }) => {
  /* (ä¸­ç•¥) */


  // WEBã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆURLã‹ã‚‰HTMLã‚’å–å¾—ã—ã¦OGPã‚’æŠ½å‡º
  const ogpImageUrls = [];
  // Promise.allã§å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹ã¨ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆå¤šå¯ã§503ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã§foræ–‡ã§ä¸€ä»¶ãšã¤å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹
  for (const postUrl of postUrls) {
    
    const res = await axios.get(postUrl.link, {
      headers: {'User-Agent': 'something different'},
    })

    // cheerioã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦HMTLã‹ã‚‰OGPç”»åƒURLã‚’æŠ½å‡º
    let ogpImageUrl;
    const $ = cheerio.load(res.data)
    $('head meta').each((i, el) => {
      const property = $(el).attr('property')
      const content = $(el).attr('content')
      if (property === 'og:image') {
        ogpImageUrls.push(ogpImageUrl);
      }
    });
  }

  // å–å¾—ã—ãŸOGPç”»åƒURLã‚’ã‚‚ã¨ã«ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
  await Promise.all(ogpImageUrls.map(async imageUrl => {
    const fileNode = await createRemoteFileNode({
      url: imageUrl,
      cache,
      store,
      createNode: actions.createNode,
      createNodeId: createNodeId,
    });

    // ä»–ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¨åŒºåˆ¥ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®è­˜åˆ¥å­ã‚’ä»˜ä¸
    await actions.createNodeField({
      node: fileNode,
      name: 'OgpImage',
      value: 'true',
    });

    // ãƒ¡ã‚¿æƒ…å ±ã¨ã—ã¦ç”»åƒã®URLã‚’ä»˜ä¸
    await actions.createNodeField({
      node: fileNode,
      name: 'link',
      value: imageUrl,
    });

    return fileNode;
  }));

      font-size: 1.8rem;
    }
  }
`

export default LayoutAlignCenter
